STRING.CAPTION: Yes
STRING.COMMENT: Button caption Yes

STRING.CAPTION: No
STRING.COMMENT: Button caption No

STRING.CAPTION: License Borrowed
STRING.COMMENT: License Borrow information title

STRING.CAPTION: License Borrowing Error
STRING.COMMENT: License Borrow Error title

STRING.CAPTION: License Returned
STRING.COMMENT: License Return information title

STRING.CAPTION: License Return Error
STRING.COMMENT: License Return Error title

STRING.CAPTION: Return Borrowed License
STRING.COMMENT: License Return Confirmation title

STRING.CAPTION: Unavailable License Alert
STRING.COMMENT: General License Unavailable error title

STRING.CAPTION: You cannot borrow a license at this time.
STRING.COMMENT: Invalid maximum borrow hours specified dialog message

STRING.CAPTION:
The borrowing period established for the license server is not valid.

Contact your system administrator to have the borrowing period reset to a value of at least one day (24 hours).
STRING.COMMENT: Invalid maximum borrow hours specified dialog message

STRING.CAPTION: Return the borrowed license now?
STRING.COMMENT: Return the borrowed license now confirmation question dialog message

STRING.CAPTION: The borrowed license has been successfully returned.
STRING.COMMENT: The borrowed license is returned back to the license server dialog message

STRING.CAPTION: There are no licenses available to borrow. Try again later.
STRING.COMMENT: No licenses available to borrow message

STRING.CAPTION: You cannot borrow a license at this time.Try again later.
STRING.COMMENT: License cannot be borrowed at this time dialog message

STRING.CAPTION:
If this problem persists, contact your system administrator.

Note:You can continue to use %1 while you are connected to the network license server.

Error: [%2]
STRING.COMMENT: No licenses available to borrow message displayed with the vendor error code and the product name

STRING.CAPTION:
If this problem persists, contact your system administrator.

Error: [%1]
STRING.COMMENT: No licenses available to borrow message displayed with the vendor error code

STRING.CAPTION: An unexpected license borrowing error has occured.
STRING.COMMENT: This message is due to inability to get the borrowing of license

STRING.CAPTION:
You can no longer run %1 using the borrowed license.

For more information, contact your system administrator.

Error: [%2]
STRING.COMMENT: This message is due to inability to get the borrowing of license

STRING.CAPTION: You can borrow this license for a maximum of %1 days.
STRING.COMMENT: This is borrow period ( maximum hours) specified is too long message

STRING.CAPTION:
To reset the license borrowing period, use the Autodesk License Borrowing utility and try again.

Error [%1]
STRING.COMMENT: This is borrow period (maximums hours) specified is too long message

STRING.CAPTION: A valid license could not be obtained by the network license manager.
STRING.COMMENT: Generic licensing error while trying to get the license from the license server displayed with the vendor error code

STRING.CAPTION:
If you are still unable to access a license, contact your system administrator.

Error [%1]
STRING.COMMENT: Generic licensing error while trying to get the license from the license server displayed with the vendor error code

STRING.CAPTION: Unavailable License Alert
STRING.COMMENT: The connection to the license server is lost hence the license will not available dialog caption

STRING.CAPTION: Your license is no longer available.
STRING.COMMENT: The connection to the license server is lost hence the license will not available dialog message

STRING.CAPTION: To re-establish the license, close and then restart this product.
STRING.COMMENT: The connection to the license server is lost hence the license will not available dialog message
